## StandardSQLDialect class

Standard SQL dialect implementation that can be used as a base class for more specific dialect imlementations.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare abstract class StandardSQLDialect implements SQLDialect 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [booleanLiteral(val)](./db.standardsqldialect.booleanliteral.md) |  | Returns literals "TRUE" or "FALSE". |
|  [stringLiteral(val)](./db.standardsqldialect.stringliteral.md) |  | Returns passed in string in single quotes and escapes all single quotes inside the string with a double single quote. |
